title: Noahide Fellowship Shabbat Dinner
description: Join fellow Noahides for a warm Shabbat dinner with Torah discussion, good food, and great company. All are welcome â€” newcomers and seasoned learners alike.

title: Seven Laws Study Group
description: A monthly deep-dive into the Seven Noahide Laws and their practical application in daily life. Led by community members with guest speakers.

title: Spring Community Picnic
description: Celebrate the season with an outdoor gathering. Bring a dish to share! Activities for families and kids. A great chance to meet the Indiana Noahide community.

title: Online Torah Class: Foundations of Faith
description: A beginner-friendly online class exploring the foundations of Noahide faith and the universal mission from the Torah. Open to anyone, anywhere.
